class.name: GraphEdit
class.brief_description: GraphEdit is an area capable of showing various GraphNodes. It manages connection events between them.
class.description: GraphEdit manages the showing of GraphNodes it contains, as well as connections and disconnections between them. Signals are sent for each of these two events. Disconnection between GraphNode slots is disabled by default. It is greatly advised to enable low-processor usage mode (see [member OS.low_processor_usage_mode]) when using GraphEdits.

method.name: _get_connection_line
method.description: Virtual method which can be overridden to customize how connections are drawn.

method.name: _is_in_input_hotzone
_is_in_output_hotzone
add_valid_connection_type
method.description: Makes possible the connection between two different slot types. The type is defined with the [method GraphNode.set_slot] method.

method.name: add_valid_left_disconnect_type
method.description: Makes possible to disconnect nodes when dragging from the slot at the left if it has the specified type.

method.name: add_valid_right_disconnect_type
method.description: Makes possible to disconnect nodes when dragging from the slot at the right if it has the specified type.

method.name: arrange_nodes
method.description: Rearranges selected nodes in a layout with minimum crossings between connections and uniform horizontal and vertical gap between nodes.

method.name: clear_connections
method.description: Removes all connections between nodes.

method.name: connect_node
method.description: Create a connection between the [code]from_port[/code] slot of the [code]from[/code] GraphNode and the [code]to_port[/code] slot of the [code]to[/code] GraphNode. If the connection already exists, no connection is created.

method.name: disconnect_node
method.description: Removes the connection between the [code]from_port[/code] slot of the [code]from[/code] GraphNode and the [code]to_port[/code] slot of the [code]to[/code] GraphNode. If the connection does not exist, no connection is removed.

method.name: get_connection_line
method.description: Returns the points which would make up a connection between [code]from[/code] and [code]to[/code].

method.name: get_connection_list
method.description: Returns an Array containing the list of connections. A connection consists in a structure of the form [code]{ from_port: 0, from: "GraphNode name 0", to_port: 1, to: "GraphNode name 1" }[/code].

method.name: get_zoom_hbox
method.description: Gets the [HBoxContainer] that contains the zooming and grid snap controls in the top left of the graph. You can use this method to reposition the toolbar or to add your own custom controls to it. [b]Warning:[/b] This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [member CanvasItem.visible] property.

method.name: is_node_connected
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]from_port[/code] slot of the [code]from[/code] GraphNode is connected to the [code]to_port[/code] slot of the [code]to[/code] GraphNode.

method.name: is_valid_connection_type
method.description: Returns whether it's possible to connect slots of the specified types.

method.name: remove_valid_connection_type
method.description: Makes it not possible to connect between two different slot types. The type is defined with the [method GraphNode.set_slot] method.

method.name: remove_valid_left_disconnect_type
method.description: Removes the possibility to disconnect nodes when dragging from the slot at the left if it has the specified type.

method.name: remove_valid_right_disconnect_type
method.description: Removes the possibility to disconnect nodes when dragging from the slot at the right if it has the specified type.

method.name: set_connection_activity
method.description: Sets the coloration of the connection between [code]from[/code]'s [code]from_port[/code] and [code]to[/code]'s [code]to_port[/code] with the color provided in the [theme_item activity] theme property.

method.name: set_selected
method.description: Sets the specified [code]node[/code] as the one selected.

signal.name: begin_node_move
signal.description: Emitted at the beginning of a GraphNode movement.

signal.name: connection_from_empty
signal.description: Emitted when user dragging connection from input port into empty space of the graph.

signal.name: connection_request
signal.description: Emitted to the GraphEdit when the connection between the [code]from_slot[/code] slot of the [code]from[/code] GraphNode and the [code]to_slot[/code] slot of the [code]to[/code] GraphNode is attempted to be created.

signal.name: connection_to_empty
signal.description: Emitted when user dragging connection from output port into empty space of the graph.

signal.name: copy_nodes_request
signal.description: Emitted when the user presses [kbd]Ctrl + C[/kbd].

signal.name: delete_nodes_request
signal.description: Emitted when a GraphNode is attempted to be removed from the GraphEdit.

signal.name: disconnection_request
signal.description: Emitted to the GraphEdit when the connection between [code]from_slot[/code] slot of [code]from[/code] GraphNode and [code]to_slot[/code] slot of [code]to[/code] GraphNode is attempted to be removed.

signal.name: duplicate_nodes_request
signal.description: Emitted when a GraphNode is attempted to be duplicated in the GraphEdit.

signal.name: end_node_move
signal.description: Emitted at the end of a GraphNode movement.

signal.name: node_selected
signal.description: Emitted when a GraphNode is selected.

signal.name: paste_nodes_request
signal.description: Emitted when the user presses [kbd]Ctrl + V[/kbd].

signal.name: popup_request
signal.description: Emitted when a popup is requested. Happens on right-clicking in the GraphEdit. [code]position[/code] is the position of the mouse pointer when the signal is sent.

signal.name: scroll_offset_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the scroll offset is changed by the user. It will not be emitted when changed in code.
